profile.description: I am a dedicated and committed person, with professional experience and internships at the Antioquia Swimming League, where I worked for 8 months. I value continuous learning and enjoy taking on new challenges that allow me to grow both personally and professionally.

experience.first-job-description: I managed and optimized MySQL/MariaDB databases, developed and maintained legacy web applications in PHP using Scriptcase, and implemented interfaces in HTML and CSS. Additionally, I collaborated in the installation and maintenance of the Swiss Timing Aquatics system, ensuring its operation alongside the technical team.
experience.second-job-description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.
experience.last-job-description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit.

hobbies.first-description: I train calisthenics several times a week, enjoying the challenge of lifting my own weight and surpassing my personal records. I am motivated by constant improvement and the discipline that this training requires!
hobbies.second-description: I am passionate about design, creating logos, images, and exploring new trends. I always seek to learn and improve, staying up to date with the latest innovations in the design world!

projects.first-project: I implemented an administrative panel in Laravel with Orchid, automatically generating a management system with permissions and roles, optimized for efficient data administration.
projects.second-project: I developed a CRUD system for car management using C# with MVC in .NET 6 and SQL Server. I implemented a modular architecture that allows efficient vehicle management.
projects.third-project: I developed an inventory system with Python, Qt Designer 5, and SQLite, creating an intuitive and visually appealing interface for efficient product management.
